name: The Son of Satan
description:
This game was made for the libGDX Jam of June 2022. I was not able to complete during the jam period because of a family emergency, but I do plan on completing my vision for the game. For now you can enjoy a nice little vertical slice of the game. 

The game is influenced very heavily by Hades and Hoplite.

Special thanks to Lyze, Fraudo, and TEttinger for their awesome support! I would not have been able to do this without them.
